title: Drawing, "Female Head in Patterned Headdress and Matching Neckpiece"
description: In the preset full frontal view, the square-shaped face is rounded at the jawline and the large eyes glance upward, but at the same time, at the viewer. A large, shoulder-length headdress, patterned in squiggles, and framing the face, and a wide semicircular matching collar evoke an ancient Egyptian style.
